reviews.review:
10/10 - Perfect (at least for me)

While I would think of the gameplay as OK, the rest is just perfect.
Buy the game to get your mind blown.
Im going to just be completly honest this is one of the best games ive ever played
die story ist eine der besten. einfach nur super

我一直喜欢这种大叔带小萝莉的剧情，虽然是今年黑五才买的，但是这11年的游戏我玩起来依然觉得震撼。游戏各种好评，我只说这是一款不会随着时间变老的游戏，我的伊丽莎白永远美美哒。
还有最后说一句[spoiler] 我凭本事救的女儿，为什么不让我。。。。	[/spoiler]

Der beste FPS, wenn nicht sogar das beste Spiel, das ich je gespielt habe.
Von der ersten Sekunde an ein pausenlos spannendes Spiel mit wunderschöner Grafik und guten Effekten.
Eine unglaublich gute und perfekt herübergebrachte Story bei der ein zweites durchspielen genauso viel Spielspaß bringt, wie beim ersten.

Kann das Spiel jedem empfehlen. 10/10

Красивая, интересная, не напрягает, очень много длинных диалогов, это единственная проблема, в ремастер первого биошока играть интереснее, больше экшена, меньше слов
В целом рекомендую к прохождению, красивая графика
Fantastic story line and dlcs. I hope you come up with more great ideas of games
这游戏最早在纯黑那里看过他做的攻略，真的好玩，这游戏真的良心
Although this game is gift by my friend ,after end this game it make me feel worth to buy ,story and more fps
One word: Elisabeth ;)

As great as this game is I played it for a little while but then I exited it it blue screened my pc I was playiong it on Ultra at 60fps so It wosen't that my pc was shit it was just a framy game and crapped out
补票，当年第一次进入天空之城哥伦比亚的时候，我想很多人和我一样，除了睁大了眼睛什么也说不出来
perfect
If you throw away all the stuff about quantum physics and parallel universes then it becomes clear that the game is about shooting people and kidnapping beautiful ladies.
O melhor jogo que já joguei.
心中神作之一

The best game in the series, and more accessible for people who don't like scary games. Amazing story which affected me for a long time (once I finally understood it). Take to the skies and admire the beautiful flying city of Columbia.

pls have mercy on my brain, it can only take so much.

still the best game ever
伊丽莎白阐述了何为神队友
I'd say if you enjoy a little biblical stuff and some killing of some evil guards, you should have fun.
Ethnic discrimination.
Amazing storyline, graphics, environment and gameplay. A must play 9/10
amazing game, plot is unbelivieble
Gra tak działąjąca na uczuciach, że aż jak ją skończyłem i zobzczyłem jak Elizabeth mnie zatapia siedziałem zwinięty w koncie przez całe napisy

это шедевр
10/10
伊丽莎白实在太可爱了！！！

Bioshock Infinite is quite simply put, one of the best games of its kind. Its got a nailbiting story, wonderful characters great combat and most of all one of the most stunning and well developed settings in any game in recent memory.

Teases you with something great but ends up feeling like a long tutorial

At first you are introduced to this beautiful city built into skies which definitely creates amazing set for a game world that you cannot wait to explore. 

After covering the basics and killing first few enemies you start exploring this inspiring world... or do you? 
After halfway trough the game the reality hits you. Bioshock Infinite is just another mediocre corridor shooter where you funnel through a more or less narrow path not leaving much choice or room to explore. Throughout the whole game you kind of wait for it to open up and show it's beautiful world but sadly it never does. While the end credits roll it's saddening to realize that you actually experienced all the game has to offer within the first few hours of gameplay. There is not really any variety in enemies or gameplay throughout out the game.

Visuals? 
Art direction is pretty and it works! 
By that I mean it does good job hiding somewhat low quality textures and all-around subpar visuals.
Aunque con el fume me parecio peor que los dos primeros y eso que no me entere de nada en ambos.
Любоваться потрясающей графикой и красивейшим летающим по небу городу Колумбия можно вечно! Дизайн города и вообще сама игра великолепна. Просто 10/10.

I only played this game once, and to be honest I barely remember what the fuck happened. However, I beat it becauase the gameplay was just so smooth. I might need to replay this one more time to recall the whole plot.
Great game.
Fun first person shooter with a fun twist to make it fresh.  Wish it was longer though
这是我在steam上买的第一个游戏，全款。当时是在网易云上听了主题曲后咬咬牙就买了。游戏画面真是太漂亮了，伊丽莎白美极了。天空之城哥伦比亚，接近上帝的地方，背后却隐藏着如此的贫穷与不公。玩到最后的痛苦与震撼，对伊丽莎白的愧疚,让我的心里久久不能平静。不愧第九艺术。最后，手柄玩得真憋屈，历经七个月，前两天才通。最后一关用键鼠才过的。

Bu oyunun kapağını görüp bu ne kardeşim bu nasıl oyun diyebilirsiniz.Yaklaşık 12 saat oynadım bu oyunu ve 12 saatin 12 saati de dolu dolu geçti.Eğer şöyle bi oyun olsun başından kalkamıyım bitirene kadar diyorsanız kesinlikle tavsiye ederim hiç durmadan 7 saat oynadım ve kesinlikle hiç haberim olmadı.Oyun o kadar güzel düşünülmüş ki ; Grafiklerden tutun oynanış , seslendirme , optimizasyon ve kalite efsane derece de iyi kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum bu oyunu.Ve oyunun sonunda mindfuck(beyin *mcuklaması yaşıyosunuz vay ananı **kiyim diyo insan.Alacak olanlar indirime girince kesinlikle paketi satın alsın.
話が難しい、それとエリザベスがかわいい
great game amazing story 9/10

There will be a time when games are considered art rather than "entertainment".
This game is the pioneer of the art of games. Everyone must experience what the game has to offer and you will realize in the end that not only the gameplay was great but also, the story blew your mind.
So, that's my opinion about this true Masterpiece​. 
Play it. For God's sake, play it...

The first few moments of the game are amazing in world building, but from there it kind of just blurs into a mechanical routine of killing everything that moves, and looting every box you can find. By end game you can equip a certain combination of items, that weaponizes jumping on and off skyhooks into a broken OP strategy that removes any sense of tension or danger. The ending was anti climatic, and big boss fights that it build up to are subverted. 

Skyhooks have one big moment where you raid an airship, that was fun.
Vigors have one area where you actually find you finally have to learn how to use them, that was also pretty fun. 
Aside from those well designed encounters, those mechanics largely remain irrelevant, and generic gun play reigns king. 

The CITC DLC is much better mechanically as it actually integrates and encourages players to play with the game, but is devoid of story. Putting the CITC combat design into the main game would've made it more engaging, and encouraged players to see the game as it's own unique vision rather than a corridor shooter with forgetable gimmicks. Playing it after the main story is a sour reminder that the devs could've made a better game, but cut it apart and watered it down. 

It is a pretty game, and technically excellent, though I wouldn't regard it as an overall amazing experience. A strong start, but a weak finish. 

It is certainly the prettiest eat food out the trash bin game I've played.

booker被elizabeth带到一个平行时空交汇的神奇地方，在这里elizabeth告诉booker，comstock并没有死，要想彻底拯救所有时空下的elizabeth，必须将comstock溺毙在襁褓里，保证comstock从来不存在，elizabeth将booker带回20年前的家里，这时的他正被债务问题困扰，在此刻3个不同的平行世界的booker命运将发生变化

第一世界的booker：booker为了还债，将自己的亲生女儿anna也就是elizabeth卖给了comstock，此后的20年里活在自己的懊悔中不能自拔，在一次洗礼中，booker接受主的救赎，获得新生改名换姓变成comstock。在成功建立了天空之城后，comstock并没有彻底忘记anna，就向第二世界20年前的自己买下anna，取名为elizabeth，所以就有了空艇上comstock说自己是为了保护elizabeth才将她关起来，也有了booker并不像elizabeth想象的清白一说。

第二世界的booker（其实也是第一世界的booker，（平行时空理论））：booker为了还债，将自己的亲生女儿anna也就是elizabeth卖给了第一世界的comstock，但是马上就后悔了，追了出去，但没能将其救下还造成了anna也就是elizabeth的小手指的残缺。所以就有了为什么在空艇上comstock说elizabeth的手指残缺是和booker有关系的原因。此后的20年里booker活在自己的懊悔中不能自拔，洛神夫妇（Mr.&Mrs.luther）因为帮助第一世界的comstock向第二世界的booker买下了anna而后悔，决定帮助这个世界booker，避免悲剧发生。

这个世界的booker（其实是第二世界卖anna前的booker，（平行时空理论））：被洛神(你懂的就是开始划船的神棍)夫妇（Mr.&Mrs.luther）给予机会进行自我救赎。那就是前往天空之城救出elizabeth而免掉债务。
当这个世界的booker得知这一切后，三个世界的记忆一起涌上心头，瞬间鼻血横流。booker答应自己的女儿anna也就是elizabeth不再受到comstock（未来的booker）的伤害，在这个时空交汇处，在即将受到洗礼成为comstock的时候，将自己溺死。

然后，因为comstock从不存在，所有其他时空的elizabeth一个接一个的消失，最后这个世界的elizabeth也消失了，这样留下来的只有还在襁褓中的anna。

摘自百度

Bioshock Infinite is a bit of a departure from the old Bioshock games. The gunplay is simplified quite a bit, the environment is far less frightening, and the story is far less "let's present the player with a compelling social commentary" and more "let's confuse the player to the point where they stop paying attention."

It's a very pretty game, and to be frank the simplified gunplay is a lot better than the previous games in the series. I still greatly prefer the original for its tone and deeply compelling narrative, but Infinite is by no means a bad game.
What can I say - the game is a must play. Gameplay is a breeze, story is mind boggling. The best part are the DLC tie-ins and the connection to Bioshock 1. Just a masterpiece.

Идеальная игра , в которой ощущаешь всю атмосферу необычного , неизведанного мира. Иного мира. 
Красивые пейзажи заставят любого любоваться ними, проникнуть в игру, как будто находишься там. Так же битвы не заставят скучать вас. Сюжет сделан на 5 из 5! Врятли останется человек не впечатленным от него, после прохождения игры. 
После того, как поиграл в BioShock Infinite, я понял, что игра стоит своих денег! Она просто идеальная из всех игр этого жанра, врятли можно придумать , что то лучше. 
Однозначно советую поиграть.
Meh.
I am still slightly freaked out by being attracted to Elizabeth and hoping for some Booker and Elizabeth action all the way trough.

细节到位，叙事自然。

饥饿的工人争抢着主角从其他时空变来的食物，喇叭循环着资本家的宣传：“牛为什么要当狮子呢？去承担那些责任……？”。这是1912年Columbia的月背。也可以是1912年纽约/巴黎的月背。

等Booker在过场字幕里说Liz同情工人的时候玩家大概也是，并且即将与Vox Populi并肩作战。不过马上就能看到vox领袖黑人女性Fitzroy罗伯斯宾尔的一面。同样可以影射19/20世纪的左翼运动。

另外，特别喜欢神棍兮兮的大型宗教雕塑连环画《大先知的故事》（有伤膝河篇、北京篇、我们的羔羊篇等）。
개씹명작 꼭 해보세요
真的很好玩 ，没有文采，也不知道该怎么写测评了， 40买的本体和dlc真是值。汉化可以右键游戏名称，属性里面选择繁体中文， 轩辕的有点问题，我一玩超过十分钟就卡了，dlc也挺良心尤其是海葬2。
我能想到的最高评价：这款游戏对第九艺术进行了完美的诠释！

以前PS3上玩了好几遍 去年趁着打折喜入了系列吃灰  前几天看到库里又重新回味了一遍  当年这游戏带给了我极大震撼  游戏性和优化非常好  画面现在看起来依然很出色不得不服美工 而且PC版还有中文  剧情结合初代简直出类拔萃  从海底万米的销魂城到九宵云外的哥伦比亚主角完成了一段冲破命运枷锁的自我救赎之旅 非要说哪里不好的话 应该只有流程不够长 让人意犹未尽   关于海葬2部DLC对剧情的补完以及良心程度在我心中只有昆特牌3的DLC能与之一战  如果说有人生有不得不玩的游戏TOP10的话 那么我觉得生化奇兵一定是其中之一

[b]Note:[/b] [i]I have not got many hours on this game as of making this review, I have only recently bought it on Steam. I have played this game 8 times over, including the DLC, and I am about to begin my 9th playthrough soon.[/i]

[h1]Summary[/h1]

BioShock Infinite is an incredible game that I never thought I'd like. This game can take you through a rollercoaster of emotions; there is never too much or too little action. The AI is possibly the best you will ever find. The graphics are absolutely stunning. The gameplay is flawless. The sounds are addicting to hear and never get annoying. Every playthrough feels different in the same way... if you catch my drift.

[b][u]See the bottom for my rating.[/u][/b]


[h1]Full Review - Top to Bottom[/h1]

[b]Let's talk about the story.[/b] As mentioned in "My Story" (at the bottom of the review) BioShock Infinite has a very confusing but also very intriguing story. This mix made me replay it even more and focus more on the details of the story than Elizabeth's... er... features. It took me four playthroughs to understand it so I guess you could say the game has a high replayability factor, especially for a single player FPS game. What makes it seem even better is the fact that each playthrough is the exact same story but it's the fact that it's like a book. It's always the same story, but a story you can read repeatedly and still feel the same emotions; you just learn more about it. It's hard to say much else without giving away the gameplay so that's all I will say. If you are planning on buying this, I can assure you that the story is god-like.
[b]Note:[/b] [i]As you go through the game, watch out for voxophones. You'll learn lots about the story that way and even learn about enemies. One specific one you may even feel bad about, it's a sad story how that enemy is developed.[/i]

[b]Let's talk about the gameplay.[/b] The gameplay in this is addicting. The skylines must be the first to bring up. I loved riding up and down the skylines hip-firing at multiple enemies and dodging bullets. The satisfaction of jumping off a skyline, meleeing an enemy off the platform and proceeding to fire the sniper rifle and performing a smooth headshot on an enemy was the best feeling I could have. Each playthrough I have tried a different combination of weapons. Trust me, they're all great for different situations and there's no perfect gun, just personal preference. BioShock Infinite also tries to force you to use different guns and ammo can run short if you're not careful. 

[b]Let's talk about the AI, and more specifically, Elizabeth.[/b] I noticed how Elizabeth was very different to your average BOT. She never felt like a BOT. Elizabeth will [i]never[/i] be doing in-human actions and you will throughout the game begin to forget that she's not even a real person. And the timing for the actions she takes is complete perfection. I managed to play the entire game with out dying once across all difficulties (believe it or not) and I would not have done that if I couldn't rely on Elizabeth to save me; whether I'm low on ammo, health or salts she would throw the one that benefits me the most at the time. Elizabeth is a character anyone could find lovable. And somehow the developers performed a miracle to make her always in the scene but also not annoying. The work that Ken (lead Dev) and the team (Irrational Games) has put into Elizabeth is phenomenal. Elizabeth certainly puts the "main" in "main character".
[b]Note:[/b] [i]I could go on about Elizabeth all day so to get you the important information that I feel will interest more people I cut out quite a bit and tried to make it as short as possible.[/i]

[b]Let's talk about the enemies used in the game.[/b] I will try my best not to spoil anything here but feel free to skip if you'd rather find out about the enemies for yourself.
[spoiler]First off is the handymen. I absolutely love the handyman. Why? Because I am forced to hate it. Other people don't have the same views, instead all the people I've talked to have different opinions each. I seem to feel frightened and intimidated immediately when the handyman enters a scene. Perhaps it's the 1999 mode that made me even more worried?[/spoiler]
Either way, the enemies are very well developed and every person seems to have their own personal favorite. Even the common soldier can be effective in battle.

[b]Let's talk about the negatives.[/b] In fact, let's list them considering there's next to no negatives.
[list]
[*] The DLC is pretty much required to fully understand the story.
[*] Controls are rather... odd.
[*] The beginning can drag a bit (until you first meet Elizabeth).
[/list]

[h1]My Story - Beginning to End[/h1]

Back on Xbox 360 this game came out for free a few years ago. I played about 20 minutes in and stopped. I'll admit, the beginning of the game wasn't very appealing as I hated the whole steampunk style. The concept seemed strange. Now? Now I wish I had played it then. I missed out on [i]so much[/i]! I'm going to be 100% honest and say, yes; I bought BioShock Infinite because Elizabeth was pretty hot. And that's kind of the only reason I downloaded the Remastered version on PC when it came out. I had also heard a lot of praise for the game but for me it looked like "just another FPS."

After playing about 2 hours in, I soon found that this game had more too it than just a hot character. I noticed that there must have been something else keeping me interested. This was the gameplay mechanics. Then I began to realize that the graphics were another satisfying feature keeping me playing, much more attractive than the original BioShock Infinite. The further I went through, the more reasons I had to keep on playing.

[b][u]My Eight Playthroughs[/u][/b]
[b]1)[/b] Upon completing my first playthrough, I felt really sad. Not just because of the ending, but because I had no idea what on earth had just happened. The whole time I had played, and I was actually paying attention, I had no clue what had happened. 
[b]2)[/b] I replayed it a second time, but this time on normal. I began to understand a little more. Then I watched a YouTube video explaining it. Then I realized that I thought I knew it but I had no idea. And even from the YouTube video I still didn't understand. 
[b]3)[/b] So I played it through for a third time but on hard. This difficulty was fine but I was only slowly learning more and more about the story. 
[b]4)[/b] I watched a YouTube video, from what I remember being over 2 hours long including the Burial at Sea DLC (when I say I completed the game I do mean the DLC included). This helped me catch on to it but to make sure that theory was fitting I played it through a fourth time on hard difficulty again. At the end I understood it finally. [i]I couldn't believe it! It took four playthroughs to understand the story[/i], with the help of YouTube videos. 
[b]5)[/b] On my fifth playthrough I began the 1999 mode. My God this was well and truly stressful considering I forced myself not to die. I'm pleased to say I completed it without dying, topping off BioShock Infinite by playing all the difficulties consistently without dying what so ever. (I have died as of today, screw Clash in the Clouds for that one). This achievement made me want to further play the game. 
[b]6, 7, 8)[/b] On my sixth, seventh and eighth playthrough I believe I succeeded A* in my knowledge of BioShock Infinite. I knew every secret room, the location of all infusions, listened to all voxophones and could (I don't like admitting this) accurately answer any question about Booker or Elizabeth such as their height, eye color, birth date and other information. I also know of pretty much all the easter eggs.
[b]9)[/b] I'm about to go back for the addictive gameplay. And Elizabeth, of course.

The time I invested into this game is rediculous and the knowledge I have of it is probably extremely unhealthy.

[b]11/10: Inspirational and Miraculous!
I´ve been playing PC games since 1991. This is the one of  the games i was waiting soo long.  Now i can die in peace.

Bioshock Infinite still stands to be one of my top 3 favorite games even after almost 4 years. There are so many things I adore about this game. The colors, the story, and the characters. I had never played an escort mission type game before Infinite and by the end I'm pretty sure I would have laid my life down for Elizabeth's happiness. Honestly, next time this game goes on sale pick it up. It's fantastic.

Когда впервые увидел игру, то сильно захотел в неё поиграть. Первый час игры был просто обалденный. Затем игра становилась всё скучнее и скучнее. Сюжет понял только после того, когда зашел в Википедию. Если бы в игре не было Элизабет и красивых пейзажев, то даже устанавливать бы не стал. Игра на 4 с небольшим минусом.

CONS: - Make dizzy if i try to find the hidden item

OVERALL very like the game, if you like memorable game, this game will blow your mind.. And the beauty of the world is amazing.. Trust me is worth it

我仍未忘记那日夕阳下的舞蹈
下个时空
我们还能再见吗
哪怕
你与我为敌

En pocas palabras, diré que éste juego es una obra de arte, una compra obligatoria; es Bioshock.
La historia de Bioshock Infinite es una de las mejores de la trilogia desde lejos, una historia que, mientras avanzas, te atrapa cada vez más. Para nada monótona o repetitiva (Al menos bajo mi punto de vista.) y la cual repetirás una y otra vez tras haber terminado el juego.
La banda sonora ayuda a que te tenga durante horas jugando, sin importar el tiempo que lleves o qué tengas que hacer luego.
Personajes bien caracterizados, hasta tal punto que cogerás cariño y odio a cada uno de la historia.
Los DLCs tal vez algo caros pero proporcionan horas y horas de diversión.
Tal vez lo único "malo" por así decir de Bioshock Infinite son los combates, que posiblemente a más de uno se le haga algo tosco. El tema de las muertes y objetos proporcionados por Elizabeth; haciendo así que revivas en el mismo sitio y que te de objetos y monedas constantemente consiguiendo que en consecuencia el juego sea más fácil en las primeras dificultades.
Recomendar un juego está bien, pero Bioshock Infinite es obligado tenerlo por un centenar de motivos. 10/10

毫无疑问，本时代最好的叙事
特别是加上DLC之后
无限应该是我除了任天堂游戏外重复游玩最多的一款游戏，每次玩都有不同的感受，真的是我一生的神作之一！

Uma historia fantastica, envolvente, boa jogabilidade ...
Um dos melhores. Basta jogar, e voçê mesmo verar.
What a blast this was i finished this game in 8 hours  the fastest i could and it was the most amazing game ive played and bought really worth the $$$$$$.

Grandísima historia y cierre a la trilogía BioShock! 

Pros:
- La historia es brillante (pedazo plot-twist) y gracias a los DLC cierra la historia de Rapture.
- Combates y exploración muy divertidos.
- Variedad de armas.

Contras:
- Las ayudas de Elisabeth te hacen el juego muy fácil (evidentemente, si juegas en los modos de dificultad más altos el juego sigue siendo muy dificil).
- Los plásmidos, quitando dos o tres el resto me parecen bastante "inútiles".

Si te gustan los FPS o ya has jugado a otro BioShock tienes que comprarlo.
this game is a perfect representation of why games should be considered their own art form.
不愧是第九艺术，整个游戏就像艺术品，蒸汽朋克风超赞，果然是被漠视的佳作

久仰bioshock大名 只通关一次 写写感想
首先 剧情方面很出色 有味道 有嚼劲 结局很震撼 不落好莱坞大场景俗套
人物塑造方面不用说 无论是画风还是剧情的人物描写 以及战斗时的场面都很仔细 
战斗系统方面总体感觉还不错 但是不出彩 尤其是敌人设定单一 枪支要么弹药少 要么伤害低 但是射击手感不错 枪支模型刻画很好 以及敌人的形象刻画精细 但是ai智商一般
环境刻画 bgm 方面 满分不用说 尤其喜欢bioshock的宗教感 19世纪风格的人物 服装 建筑 还有我最喜欢的古典音乐 印象最深的就是主角在第一次找伊丽莎白的时候看见圣女雕像 放着巴赫的g弦咏叹调 真的很舒服 很有感觉 
总体来说 这是一个可以休闲又可以细细品味的游戏 不像大型沙盒游戏那样元素繁多 需要投入大量精力 也不像快餐游戏那样突突突完事删游戏 真的给了我很好的游戏体验 缺点完全可以忽略 也不存在跳出 运行卡顿等技术问题 真的算是一款神作 给满分

Best campaign I have ever played through. 
The world, the story, the gameplay, the mindfuck. Everything is on point. 

Play this if you give a tiny shit about being immersed in a singleplayer game.
UNA OBRA DE ARTE.
Been a fan of BioShock since the first release, and while this is different, it's certainly a great game.

Bioshock Infinite is the first game I completed in one sitting, nonstop. 

It's story is great, yet a twist on the other Bioshock's bringing in similar yet new mechanics.

The characters are fantastic in the way they play off each other.

The atmosphere is gorgeous, being high up in the sky, especially towards the ending.

When I finished the game I felt satisfied.


(P.S I named a fish after Booker.)
In my top 3 games ever. Worth buying!
Прекрасна игра с отличным сужетом и геймплеем

Finished this game in almost a single day, could not stop playing this game. Awesome gameplay. beautiful graphics even tho its kinda old, amazing storytelling and characters! Go buy it rn, you'll love it, even if you havent played BioShock or BioShock 2.

Это шедевр)
Описывать бесполезно - некоторые вещи надо попробовать испытать самому.
Very good game. GReat story with very easy controls.

В этом шедевре вы выступаете в роли Морта, тоесть коллектора Букера Дэвитта, а в качестве Рика выступает красавица Элизабет или Анна, тут уж вам решать, как её называть. Суть игры заключается в том, что вы путешествуете в череде бесконечных пародоксов во вселенной Bioshock с механикой серии Borderlands. Нет, ну правда, захожу в "Биошок", а такое чувство, будто играю в "Борду" с теми же щитами, высокими прыжками, механикой стрельбы, только с аэротрассами и суперспособностями в виде напитков, изменяющих вас на генном уровне. Даже NPC ведут себя в бою, как в "Борде", а конкретно я играл во вторую часть. А теперь по порядку...

Плюсо-минусы:

Сюжет 
Как я упомянул ранее, в этой игре всё завязано на путешествиях в тех или инных ирреальностях. Как мне кажется, это же в какой-то мере и косяк игры. Было чувство, как после просмотра 5го Терминатора, но это лечится после повторных прохождений. Также в игре есть право выбора, но на концовку это никак не влияет, только на то, окажитесь ли вы расистом или нет и будете ли вы ходить с замотанной рукой до конца игры.

Геймплей 
Всё играется так же бодренько и весело, как и в Borderlands 2. В добавок из развлечений специальные воздушные рельсы, дабы упростить путешествие по Колумбии, а мир между прочем полуоткрытый. Ну, и конечно, энергетики, которые предают разнообразие в способы наказания ваших врагов.

Могу с уверенностью сказать, что эта игра заслуживает определённое место в зале славы видеоигр за новаторство в сюжете.
Обязательно к приобретению!
จบได้ประทับใจและซึ้งมากๆ ผมให้ 10/10 เลยเกมนี้  ภาพและเนื่อเรื่องการสื่ออารมของตัวละคร ถือว่าทำออกมาได้เยี่ยม ชอบสุดๆเลย ถ้าคุณชอบกับการเล่นคนเดียวลุยเรื่องเรื่องไปเลื่อยๆ เกมนี้ไม่ผิดหวังนะ สำหรับผม

The greatest video game story you will ever experience

The characters are layered. The city is brimming with personality. The plot is complex, and twists will be thrown at you every minute. The message is strong. The culmination is heartbreaking. My only complaint was that I got bored of shooting, and just wanted to listen to more dialogue

An absolute masterpiece, a game that is imbedded with remarkable graphics and fascinating story(though confusing).It is one of those games that you wish they never end, but you want to finish it in order to understand it and after completion you regret finishing it.I highly recommend purchasing this game with its DLCs. Speaking of DLCs,it is one of the best in a narrative game in my opinion that has a compelling story that ties beautifully to the first BioShock. The ending to BioShock Infinite broke my mind then after playing the dlc it broke my heart :(

Would You Kindly purchase this game?

~10/10

Из детской комнаты доносится музыка, он заходит в детскую, и зовёт дочь по имени". БУМ! .... Откидываюсь на спинку стула и залипаю в одну точку минут 10.

einfach geil

Garbage game.

The mechanics get boring almost immediately, it's arguably a few steps back from previous games in terms of gunplay. If you want a good FPS, buy Wolfenstein, it's a lot better than this. The writing is awful too. Trying to explore concepts like guilt doesn't work when it's only vauge and briefly mentioned. The story ends up like an awful parody of Monsters Inc with the whole "doors" thing, and the plot twists are just completely unnecessary. 

The lore and environment are pretty cool, but definitely not worth the £19.99 RRP. It's probably not even worth buying on sale as the gameplay is a complete drag.
Just awesome.  Great storyline and fun to play.

毋庸置疑，这是我玩过的剧情最震撼的游戏之一，人物性格在旅途中刻画的淋漓尽致，结局让我久久不能平静，而游戏画面，可以用艺术来形容，伊丽莎白更是一个好队友，我只想说一句话，伊丽莎白当我女儿吧！
十分推荐这款游戏，真的不亏.
